title: Meet Citi at Work El Salvador - An Exclusive Program for Companies and Their Employees
summary: San Salvador, El Salvador – With the launch of Citi at Work, the bank is always within your reach. This new program offers a wide range of opportunities, benefits, privileges and products tailored to companies and their personnel.
tag-1: Meet Citi at Work El Salvador - An Exclusive Program for Companies and Their Employees
tag-3: San Salvador, El Salvador – With the launch of Citi at Work, the bank is always within your reach. This new program offers a wide range of opportunities, benefits, privileges and products tailored to companies and their personnel.
tag-4: Citi at Work is a corporate program targeted to the major companies in El Salvador, offering a complete product and financial services solution, with exclusive benefits right at the workplace.
tag-5: "Citibank is now where it's needed the most. We arrive at your company offering the best integrated solutions available in the market and most importantly, fulfilling your needs at no additional cost," said Rigoberto Conde, VP, Citi at Work El Salvador.
tag-6: Through this program, a company could easily manage its payroll, providing a full banking-product offering. Citi at Work helps companies make better financial decisions that will guarantee them and their personnel a better future.
tag-8: To offer Citi at Work at your company and its exclusive benefits to your personnel, please contact our representatives at 2212-2893 or 2212-2894, or email gestiones.svcaw@citi.com, and they will give you more information on this new program.
tag-9: Don´t miss the opportunity to participate in Citi at Work. By partnering with Citi, you can enjoy some of the best financial benefits.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
tag-11: Citi China  Citi first established an office in China on May 15, 1902, in Shanghai. In April 2007, Citi was among the first international banks to locally incorporate in China. Citi's locally incorporated entity is known as Citibank (China) Co Ltd, which is wholly owned by Citibank N.A. Today Citi is a leading international bank in China, and has twelve corporate bank branches - in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Tianjin, Chengdu, Hangzhou, Dalian, Chongqing, Guiyang, Nanjing and Changsha - and thirty-nine consumer bank outlets. With operations in more than 160 countries around the world, Citi is the most global of all international banks in China.
